projects.title: VueSweeper
projects.info: A minesweeper game built using Vue, Typescript, Vuetify and Pinia with features to change difficulty and theme.

projects.title: Pokemon Database
projects.info: A React-Redux project using the PoKemon API and allows the user to view, search and filter PoKemon.

projects.title: Cook Book
projects.info: Full stack app using the Spoonacular API. React for the Front End, with Express/NodeJS for the backend with authentication in place. MongoDB used for the Database for storing user credentials, favourites and caching data from API calls.

projects.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
projects.info: A Rock, Paper, Scissors game built using React.
